attributes.action: Should BBC Stars Salaries Be Made Public?
attributes.additional_details: Every pound the BBC takes from licence fee-payers must be shown to have been spent well The BBC must publicly identify the names and salaries of its highest-paid stars This will significantly increase the degree of transparency and help restore confidence after a series of scandals and controversies. All this must be debated by Members of Parliament

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC Trust to decide upon, although the Government is taking a close interest.
